nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Required Setup:
Make sure the Gmail label "To-Do" exists. (You can create it manually in Gmail settings if it doesn't.)

Connect your Gmail and Google Tasks accounts via OAuth2 in n8n credentials.

Grant necessary access scopes to read emails and manage tasks.
